introduction-to-cassete.jl.title: Introduction to Cassete.jl
introduction-to-cassete.jl.intro: "Cassette is a Julia package that provides a mechanism for dynamically injecting code transformation passes into Julia’s just-in-time (JIT) compilation cycle, enabling post hoc analysis, optimization, and modification of"Cassette-unaware"Julia programs." We will show some simple usage of Cassette.jl and how it work conceptually.
